item.title: Grace add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "We must be willing to let go of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Grace add a quote by Hafiz
Grace add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "What we speak becomes the house we live in." -- Hafiz

item.title: Grace add a quote by Hafiz of Shiraz
item.description: "Remember for just one minute of the day, it would be best to try looking upon yourself more as God does, for She knows your true royal nature." -- Hafiz of Shiraz

item.title: Grace add a quote by Hafiz or Shiraz
item.description: "I wish I could show you when you are lonely and in darkness the astonishing light of your own being." -- Hafiz or Shiraz

item.title: Grace add a quote by hafiz
item.description: "I am a hole in a flute that the Christ's breath moves through.....listen to this music" -- hafiz

item.title: Grace add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "Fear is the cheapest room in the house. I would like to see you living In better conditions." -- Hafiz

item.title: Grace add a quote by Daniel Ladinsky
item.description:
"What Would Happen if God leaned down
And gave you a full wet Kiss?
Hafiz Doesn't mind answering astronomical questions Like that:
You would surely start Reciting all day, inebriated,
Rogue-poems Like This." -- Daniel Ladinsky
